# Info
Show messages in chat when players No Scope, Kills thrusmoke, Kills while flashed, etc.

# Requires:
https://github.com/schwarper/cs2-store

https://github.com/roflmuffin/CounterStrikeSharp

# Config
```
// This configuration was automatically generated by CounterStrikeSharp for plugin 'KillsRewards', at 2024/10/11 09:42:48
{
  "Prefix": "{silver}- {red}[ Store ]{silver} -",
  "GiveCreditsBasedOnDistance": true,  // wheter to give credits based on distance ex: 10 meters = 10 credits if you set this to true ignore the other settings. if not, then configure urself the credits amount.
  "GiveCredits": true,         // if you set this to false players will not recieve credits anymore.
  "MidAirCredits": 10,
  "MidAirNoScopeCredits": 20,
  "NoScopeCredits": 10,
  "HeadshotCredits": 20,
  "NoScopeHeadshotCredits": 30,
  "ThruSmokeCredits": 50,
  "ThruSmokeNoScopeCredits": 60,
  "ThruSmokeHeadshotCredits": 70,
  "ThruSmokeNoScopeHeadshotCredits": 80,
  "FlashBanggedCredits": 40,
  "FlashBangThruSmokeCredits": 90,
  "FlashBangHeadshotCredits": 100,
  "FlashBangNoScopeCredits": 110,
  "FlashBangNoScopeHeadshotCredits": 120,

  "Settings": {
    "EnableMidAir": true,
    "EnableMidAirNoScope": true,
    "EnableNoScope": true,
    "EnableHeadshot": true,
    "EnableNoScopeHeadshot": true,
    "EnableThruSmoke": true,
    "EnableThruSmokeNoScope": true,
    "EnableThruSmokeHeadshot": true,
    "EnableThruSmokeNoScopeHeadshot": true,
    "EnableFlashBangged": true,
    "EnableFlashBangThruSmoke": true,
    "EnableFlashBangHeadshot": true,
    "EnableFlashBangNoScope": true,
    "EnableFlashBangNoScopeHeadshot": true
  },
  "ConfigVersion": 1
}
```
